import React from 'react'; import useScrollReveal from '../hooks/useScrollReveal'; const About = () => { const [ref, isVisible] = useScrollReveal(0.1); return (

About Me

A passionate Computer Science student with a drive for innovation and impact

{/* Left Column - Text Content */}

I'm a Computer Science student at UC Davis with a Technology Management minor, currently interning as a Software Engineer at Walmart Global Tech. My passion lies in building innovative solutions that combine AI/ML with practical applications.

I've led significant projects including a Natural Language to SQL Chatbot with 92% accuracy and a Receipt Recipe Recommender used by 100+ testers. As Vice President of Operations for the AI Student Collective, I've organized symposiums for 400+ attendees and managed teams across multiple organizations.

My goal is to leverage technology to solve real-world problems and create meaningful impact through innovative software solutions.

{/* Education Card */}

Education

University of California, Davis

BS Computer Science, Technology Management Minor

Sep 2022 - Jun 2026

{/* Technical Skills */}

); }; export default About;
